name: Too Small to Matter
description:
A small Narrative game about animals trying to survive a war.

The Team

This game was made for the NaNoRenO 2023 by:

  • André Antunes - Writer and Programmer
  • Beatriz Azevedo - Artist
  • Diogo Pires - Programmer
  • Gonçalo Goulão - Artist
  • Rita Torres - Artist

We are part of a college game dev group called GameDev Técnico.

You can find us here!
